If an intervention sets a user's rating for a specific movie as high, will this influence the likelihood of future recommendations for other movies?
Explanation: If a high rating is set for a movie, any future recommendations for movies of the same genre will start with an enhanced base score, influenced by the positive offset caused by the high rating, thus increasing the likelihood of a recommendation.
